name: c64-mcp
description: Local MCP server for controlling a Commodore 64 via Ultimate 64 REST API

tools.name: upload_and_run_basic
tools.description: Upload and run a BASIC program on the C64

tools.name: read_screen
tools.description: Read 1KB of screen memory from the C64

tools.name: reset_c64
tools.description: Reset the C64 via REST API
